headline: DON'T MISS THE BLOCKCHAIN REVOLUTION!
description: At Blockbrainers we assist companies and entrepreneurs in their Blockchain transition.

error.invalid: Please provide a valid email address

dapp.headline: DApp design and development
dapp.text: At Blockbrainers, we really beleive in a fully decentralized world. Blockbrainers designs and implements Decentrlized Applications running on Ethereum, EOS, or Hyperledger.

smartcontracts.headline: Smart contract development
smartcontracts.text: At Blockbrainers, we design, develop and deploy smart contracts to Ethereum or EOS Blockchain written in Solidity and C++.

crytpowallets.headline: Crypto wallet integration
crytpowallets.text: At Blockbrainers, we can build fully operational currency wallets and exchanges.

tokens.headline: Token implementation
tokens.text: At Blockbrainers, we create top level ERC20 tokens. ERC20, the Ethereum token standard, is a technical standard used for smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain.

consulting.headline: Blockchain consulting
consulting.text: Blockbrainers business analysts will help you define your needs and will propose Blockchain based solutions to improve your business.

integration.headline: Blockchain integration
integration.text: At Blockbrainers, we customize Blockchain solutions to solve problems and create new opportunities for your business.

training.headline: Blockchain training
training.text: At Blockbrainers, we shared our knoledges. We offer functional or technical training for enterprise.

idea.headline: Idea
idea.text: You have an idea, contact and explain it to us!

introduction.headline: Introduction
introduction.text: We meet for a first introduction and discuss your idea.

analysis.headline: Project Analysis
analysis.text: Blockbrainers's business analysts will work hand by hand with you to define your needs.

architechture.headline: Project architechture
architechture.text: Blockbrainers blockchain architects and engineers, will design the technical architecture that meet all the project requirements.

timeFrame.headline: Project time frame
timeFrame.text: At this phase, we'll provide you a time frame for the project.

mvp.headline: MVP
mvp.text: Blockbrainers engineers will implement a Minimum Valuable Product ofr your project.

fullImplementation.headline: Full implementation
fullImplementation.text: If the MVP meets the project base requrements, we'll implement the full scale version of your project.

maintenance.headline: Maintenance
maintenance.text: Even after the project, Blockbrainers we'll stay on your sides to make sure your product is up to date.
